unnormalised: Guys, is it just me or is debugging in VS Code getting clunkier? I spent like 3 hrs trying to figure out why my Python script wasn't running correctly; turns out I had a syntax error on line 27. Maybe IntelliJ is better? My friend Rohan swears by it, says it's worth the Rs. 20,000 for the license. Anyone else facing similar issues? Or am I just coding at 3:00 AM too often?
normalised: Guys, is it just me or is debugging in V-S Code getting clunkier? I spent like three hours trying to figure out why my Python script was not running correctly; turns out I had a syntax error on line twenty seven. Maybe IntelliJ is better? My friend Rohan swears by it, says it is worth the rupee twenty thousand for the license. Anyone else facing similar issues? Or am I just coding at three zero zero A-M too often?
